participant_1.name: Evelyn
participant_1.personality: Nurturing and creative, with a passion for gardening and drawing. Enjoys spending time with her grandchildren.
participant_1.background: I'm not very close to my family, but I love my garden. I am an adult who exercises every day to keep my heart and lungs healthy. I enjoy drawing comics for my grandchildren to enjoy. I hate that I got my brain from the dad I never met. I'm looking for a home that is close to grocery stores so I can take advantage of my couponing skills.

participant_2.name: Marcus
participant_2.personality: Artistic and adventurous, with a fascination for creating jewelry and flying model airplanes. Enjoys romantic comedies and has a whimsical side.
participant_2.background: I have been to Mardi Gras in New Orleans, and it was an amazing experience. I'm terrified of heights. I love the feeling of creating something beautiful, and I find that jewelry design is a great way to express my creativity. I enjoy listening to jazz while I fly my model airplanes. I love romantic comedies, and they help me forget about my bad luck in relationships.

content.text: Hey!
Hello! How are you doing today?
I'm doing well! I'm just getting home from work. How about you?
Good! Just got home from Mardi Gras. It was so much fun!
Oh that's awesome! I've always wanted to go to Mardi Gras.
You should! It's such a great time!
Maybe I'll go next year. Where did you go to Mardi Gras?
I went to New Orleans! It was amazing. The food, the music, the people, it was all so great.
That sounds awesome! I'm jealous.
You should definitely go sometime!
I will! Thanks for the suggestion.
No problem! So, what do you like to do for fun?
I like to garden, draw comics, and cook.
Oh that's cool! I love to draw too.
Really? What kind of things do you like to draw?
I like to draw people, animals, and landscapes.
That's awesome! I like to draw comics, mostly about my family and friends.
Oh that's cool! I'd love to see some of your work sometime.
Sure! I can send you some of them later.
Awesome! Thanks!
No problem!
So, what do you like to cook?
I like to cook a lot of different things, but my favorite is probably pasta.
Oh that's cool! I love pasta too! What kind of pasta do you like to make?
I like to make all kinds of pasta, but my favorite is probably spaghetti with meatballs.
That sounds delicious! I love meatballs!
Me too! I could eat them all day.
Me too! We should have a pasta party sometime!
That would be fun
